parameters.name: trendingtemperaturequery
parameters.value:
SELECT * 
FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE CAST(temperaturef as FLOAT) > 60

parameters.name: tempquery
parameters.value:
SELECT * 
FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE CAST(temperaturef as FLOAT) > 70
